lead_paragraph: In a free-for-all news conference, the president took aim at enemies old and new: journalists, judges and secret-sharing Judases.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR, MAGGIE HABERMAN and GLENN THRUSH

headline.main: In 77 Chaotic Minutes, Trump Defends ‘Fine-Tuned Machine’
headline.print_headline: An Aggrieved President Stands Up for Himself
